findings.title: Production Build Completely Broken - White Screen of Death
findings.description: The production build (npm run preview) shows a completely blank white screen. CSP policy blocks inline event handlers with strict nonce + strict-dynamic enforcement.
findings.impact: Application is 100% unusable in production mode. This is a SHIP BLOCKER.
reproduction: Observe: Blank white screen, no UI rendered
consoleErrors: Refused to execute inline event handler because it violates CSP directive
frame-ancestors ignored when delivered via <meta> element
X-Frame-Options may only be set via HTTP header
findings.fix: Remove inline event handlers from HTML. Move CSP to HTTP headers. Fix vite-plugin-csp.ts nonce injection.

findings.title: CSP Headers Incorrectly Set via Meta Tags
findings.description: X-Frame-Options and frame-ancestors set via <meta> instead of HTTP headers. Browsers ignore these.
findings.impact: Security headers ineffective. Vulnerable to clickjacking.
consoleErrors: X-Frame-Options may only be set via an HTTP header
findings.fix: Move headers to server config (Nginx/Vercel headers)
